Player History
Had first career hit on 4/3/1985, off Dave Stieb (TOR)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/5/1985, off Doyle Alexander (TOR)...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/2/1986, hitting .609 with 0 HR, 9 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Boston on 10/3/1986...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 2/5/1987 to a 4-year deal worth $18,000,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/1987, hitting .542 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Toronto on 7/29/1987...
Injured on 5/15/1988 with a Fractured Ulna, out for 5-6 weeks...
Injured on 8/11/1988 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/5/1989 with a Strained Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 6/18/1990 with a Scratched Cornea Eye, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Leftfield in 1990...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 2/10/1991 to a 3-year deal worth $17,500,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Texas on 4/8/1992...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Centerfield in 1992...
10/6/1993: Signed a contract extension with Oakland, $4,040,000 per year, for 2 years.
